item.description:
This is a new place for us to walk.  Afterward, we’ll go nearby for lunch.  No charge for walk.  For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. 

Directions to walk:  I-84 Exit 39 (Rt. 4), turn right onto Rt. 10, go about 6 miles to Rt. 44W, turn left about 1 mile, turn right onto Rt. 10, go 4.8 miles (becomes Hopmeadow St.), turn right onto Mall Way (by Cannon Building just after CVS small mall), just past stop sign pull into parking lot on left side.  We’ll meet there.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the parking lot waiting for you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
